revised_title: Worms in the Heads of Sheep: A Study on their Anatomy and Effects
tldr: This article describes the discovery of a type of worm found in the heads of sheep. The author, John Thorpe, provides a detailed description of the worm's anatomy, habitat, and behavior. He also discusses the potential health effects of these worms on sheep and their possible connection to human ailments. The article highlights the need for further research on these parasites and their impact on animal and human health.
